feature_descriptions.name: id
feature_descriptions.description: Describe the risk indicator of the customer.  1 if they ran into financial difficulty and 0 otherwise.

feature_descriptions.name: operation_date
feature_descriptions.description: The date the transaction took place.

feature_descriptions.name: RiskPerformance
feature_descriptions.description: Risk performance indicator

feature_descriptions.name: ExternalRiskEstimate
feature_descriptions.description: Estimated external risk level

feature_descriptions.name: MSinceOldestTradeOpen
feature_descriptions.description: Months since the oldest trade account was opened

feature_descriptions.name: MSinceMostRecentTradeOpen
feature_descriptions.description: Months since the most recent trade account was opened

feature_descriptions.name: AverageMInFile
feature_descriptions.description: Average months reported since the file was created

feature_descriptions.name: NumSatisfactoryTrades
feature_descriptions.description: Number of satisfactory trades

feature_descriptions.name: NumTrades60Ever2DerogPubRec
feature_descriptions.description: Number of trades with 60+ days past due or derogatory public records ever

feature_descriptions.name: NumTrades90Ever2DerogPubRec
feature_descriptions.description: Number of trades with 90+ days past due or derogatory public records ever

feature_descriptions.name: PercentTradesNeverDelq
feature_descriptions.description: Percentage of trades never delinquent

feature_descriptions.name: MSinceMostRecentDelq
feature_descriptions.description: Months since the most recent delinquency

feature_descriptions.name: MaxDelq2PublicRecLast12M
feature_descriptions.description: Maximum delinquency reported in the last 12 months

feature_descriptions.name: MaxDelqEver
feature_descriptions.description: Maximum delinquency ever reported

feature_descriptions.name: NumTotalTrades
feature_descriptions.description: Total number of trades

feature_descriptions.name: NumTradesOpeninLast12M
feature_descriptions.description: Number of trades opened in the last 12 months

feature_descriptions.name: PercentInstallTrades
feature_descriptions.description: Percentage of installment trades

feature_descriptions.name: MSinceMostRecentInqexcl7days
feature_descriptions.description: Months since the most recent inquiry excluding the last 7 days

feature_descriptions.name: NumInqLast6M
feature_descriptions.description: Number of inquiries in the last 6 months

feature_descriptions.name: NumInqLast6Mexcl7days
feature_descriptions.description: Number of inquiries in the last 6 months excluding the last 7 days

feature_descriptions.name: NetFractionRevolvingBurden
feature_descriptions.description: Net fraction revolving burden

feature_descriptions.name: NetFractionInstallBurden
feature_descriptions.description: Net fraction installment burden

feature_descriptions.name: NumRevolvingTradesWBalance
feature_descriptions.description: Number of revolving trades with balance

feature_descriptions.name: NumInstallTradesWBalance
feature_descriptions.description: Number of installment trades with balance

feature_descriptions.name: NumBank2NatlTradesWHighUtilization
feature_descriptions.description: Number of bank/national trades with high utilization

feature_descriptions.name: PercentTradesWBalance
feature_descriptions.description: Percentage of trades with balance
